title: AED Game Character Voice - The Pirate
description: Sail the high seas with this quality, custom crafted voice pack! Perfect for all your high seas adventurers and ready to set sail straight out of the box!
longDescription:
Audio Demo

AED Game Character The Pirate voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences. 

The Pirate voice profile is comedic, light-hearted, fun and cheerful! Perfect for any sea-faring or comedic, in-game non-player characters or any antagonist game characters with elements of rugged and playful tendencies. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.

Features:

  • Vocal Profile: Deep, Rich, Gritty, Male Voice
  • Perfect for NPC's like rogues, pirates, shop keepers, treasure hunters and film or movie based trailers.
  • Featuring 137 custom lines and 140 NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.
  • Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping, battle cries and comedic quips and language to fully flesh out your newly created seafaring rogue!
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • Royalty Free and YouTube friendly
  • Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  316 male voice-over audio files
  • 50.6 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format

Number of Audio Waves: 316

Number of Audio Cues: 316

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
